abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, Push 1 to all obstacles and enemies adjacent to you.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: Enemies cannot use Action Movement, Free Movement, or teleports to enter a space adjacent to you.
If an enemy discards your Challenge token using an enemy Action or Ability, the enemy who held the token takes 3 damage.
abilities.trigger: if an enemy discards your challenge token using an enemy action or ability

actions.name: Beacon
actions.desc:
Pull up to 4 to an ally you can see, other than yourself.
4+, Once per turn: You and that ally heal.

actions.name: Blinding Light
actions.desc:
Challenge an adjacent enemy, then Push 1 and give them 1 Burning token.
5+: Instead, Push 3 and give them 3 Burning tokens.
